stories.Title: If you're into nuclear energy, head to Microsoft!
stories.Description: A recent job posting unveiled their quest for nuclear experts. The mission? Harness the potential of small modular nuclear reactors to fuel cloud and AI infrastructure.
stories.Tweet: If you're into nuclear energy, head to Microsoft! 📦 A recent job posting unveiled their quest for nuclear experts. The mission? Harness the potential of small modular nuclear reactors to fuel cloud and AI infrastructure. #microsoft https://www.cnbc.com/2023/09/25/microsoft-is-hiring-a-nuclear-energy-expert-to-help-power-data-centers.html

stories.Title: Get ready for Connect
stories.Description: Meta's annual Connect event is taking place tomorrow, filled with exciting updates in VR, AR, and the metaverse. Of course, this year will also feature a touch of AI, so stay tuned for details.

stories.Title: Feeling the heat
stories.Description: Could it be the initial setup period or something more complex? iPhone 15 users claim their phones overheat without apparent cause. We'll have to wait and see what happens.

stories.Title: Defying Mars' roads
stories.Description: There's no impossible route for NASA's Perseverance rover. It showcases its skillful maneuvers each day, breaking exploration time records, all thanks to its autonomous navigation system.
stories.Tweet: Defying Mars' roads 📦 There's no impossible route for NASA's Perseverance rover. stories.Title: Advertising lands on My AI
stories.Description: Snapchat and Microsoft are teaming up for personalized advertising. Users receive sponsored links, and advertisers make connections at the right time. It's a win-win for everyone!
stories.Tweet: Advertising lands on My AI 📦 Snapchat and Microsoft are teaming up for personalized advertising. Users receive sponsored links, and advertisers make connections at the right time. stories.Title: Introducing your new opponent
stories.Description: Just when you thought AI could not go further, it enters your family game night. Pictionary, the classic sketching game, will soon let you test your artistic skills against artificial intelligence.

stories.Description: Spotify's upcoming Voice Translations feature breaks language barriers. Your favorite podcasts will soon speak to you in multiple languages, preserving their authentic style.

stories.Description: This innovative tool continuously detects code anti-patterns and issues, making your development process smoother and more efficient.

title: Microsoft's nuclear boost, Spotify unveils Voice Translations, AI joins your game night
description: Data centers as big as Microsoft's certainly need a lot of power, which is why the tech giant is taking a nuclear approach to the issue. Is your favorite podcast in another language? Do you sometimes struggle to understand what they say? Don't worry, Spotify's latest feature is here to help. And, for board game fans, get ready to welcome a new rival that might be difficult to defeat – yes, it's AI.
